content: A truly brilliant game. The whole music thing and gameplay are really good, I can't praise it enough

Constant force closing. The game is absolutely phenomenal on Steam, so bought it on Android. Couldn't be more disappointed. Having a controller connected directly just causes an app crash - neither shoutcast streams nor any music that is stored externally can be found (could only launch when I disconnected the controller). I would ask for my money back if it weren't for the game being so addictive (on windows at least). I recommend buying it on your PC and steering clear of this version.
Is there a reason it can't find my music I have downloaded ???
Game crashes on startup on LG V60. Had to refund.
It's an incredible game, the visuals are intense and the boss battles are a level 11 out of 10
Doesn't support any controller I tried using (PS4, XBOX One, Razer Raiju Mobile). I was never even able to get past the controller configuration menu. Waste of time.
This is simply LIT,... Needs a bit more work on the framerate tho, playing on P9 Prime lowest graphical setting and still stutters a bit.
You can't play your own music like part 1
I'm enjoying the game , but when I hook up my PS4 controller the controls are inverted and can't un- invert them
Fun android port. just wished it supported ps3 controller.

Xbox One S controller support is broken. The pad doesn't work properly in the configuration section, where it gets stuck on Right Trigger assignment, or game play, where only one joystick is read at a time. Please fix and I will re-rate.

Beat Hazard 2 has alot of improvements, and even better UI and a more competitive feel to the game with the ships and various power ups you can use at your disposal. My gripe really is the same as the first game, and I hope the developer sees more of this in reviews. This game's mobile controls needs to have it where the virtual joysticks you can place them where ever you want them too, and you could even implement a transparency slider so the player can still see behind the virtual sticks.
Worth the money and best game ever.
Can't get past the control selection screen, the game freezes.

Ahh, yes... the app that's just perfect for your eye and eargasm. Every beat drop brings you closer to seizure that you know will be just worth it XD. The only problem though is I just can't get connected to the online radio in app.

There is a bug in the controller setup that only allows three of the four analogue inputs on the controller in game. It's impossible to get past the controller config screen without assigning one button with two actions. I love the game on Steam, and I also wish there was some cross-save support. Pixel 4 XL with an Xbox One S controller.

I love this game, I've been playing since the first one and I truly enjoy the new features that you guys added. My only problem is my game won't open anymore. If you guys have any solutions it would be appreciated. Keep up the good work
